name: Mindless Matcher
description:
This is a simple endless match-3 game with a bright and positive aesthetic. Use it to get yourself calm yet distracted. The intent is for the game to go for as long as you want or to try to achieve personal goals like a high score or an achievement.

===Credits===

Solo Project by Peter Gomes

===Music Assets Used===

Always With Me, Always With You (Main) - ZakharValaha

The Cradle of Your Soul = lemonmusicstudio

Moment - SergeQuadrado

Simple Piano Melody - ZakharValaha

Among Us lofi hip hop - beats to be sus to - Lumpy Touch

===SFX Assets Used===

Bubble bursting, popping - ianslattery

el interface button 22 hpx - Videvo

Plastic bubble click - Mixkit.co

Interface click hover - Mixkit.co
